org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.api

Interface ProfileApi


  • public interface ProfileApi
    The profile REST API.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Delete a 3Pid of a user

      Get a user's display name.

      Update a user's display name.
      void forgetPassword(ForgetPasswordParams params, <any> callback)
      Reset the password server side.
      void requestEmailValidation(RequestEmailValidationParams params, <any> callback)
      Request a validation token for an email Note: Proxies the identity server API validate/email/requestToken, but first checks that the given email address is not already associated with an account on this Home Server.
      void requestEmailValidationForRegistration(RequestEmailValidationParams params, <any> callback)
      Request a validation token for an email being added during registration process Note: Proxies the identity server API validate/email/requestToken, but first checks that the given email address is not already associated with an account on this Home Server.
      void requestPhoneNumberValidation(RequestPhoneNumberValidationParams params, <any> callback)
      Request a validation token for a phone number Note: Proxies the identity server API validate/msisdn/requestToken, but first checks that the given phone number is not already associated with an account on this Home Server.
      void requestPhoneNumberValidationForRegistration(RequestPhoneNumberValidationParams params, <any> callback)
      Request a validation token for a phone number being added during registration process Note: Proxies the identity server API validate/msisdn/requestToken, but first checks that the given phone number is not already associated with an account on this Home Server.
      void threePIDs(<any> callback)
      List all 3PIDs linked to the Matrix user account.
      void tokenrefresh(TokenRefreshParams refreshParams, <any> callback)
      Pass params to the server for the token refresh phase.
      void updatePassword(ChangePasswordParams passwordParams, <any> callback)
      Update the password

      • requestEmailValidation

        void requestEmailValidation(RequestEmailValidationParams params,
                            <any> callback)
        Request a validation token for an email Note: Proxies the identity server API validate/email/requestToken, but first checks that the given email address is not already associated with an account on this Home Server.
        Parameters:
        callback - the asynchronous callback

      • requestEmailValidationForRegistration

        callback - the asynchronous callback
